extendedInfo.description: Search, browse and now save Corcoran properties near you in New York City, The Hamptons and East End of Long Island, and South Florida.Search all Corcoran properties from any location and customize your search by price range, number of rooms, bedrooms, bathrooms, and much more.Find homes for sale or rent, as well as open houses near you happening right now, using the iPhone's built-in location finder, all for free.Find things to do near Corcoran listings with our exclusive 'Get Out Nearby' option, powered by BlackBook City Guides. Directly connect to FourSquare from any neighborhood location and let your friends know what you're doing.Get comprehensive information on all Corcoran properties in the palm of your hand, including full screen color photographs, maps, interactive floorplans, local amenities, detailed descriptions and contact information. Connect directly to each listing on corcoran.com for more information.

reviews.title: Good App
reviews.comment: Like the App, just wish doing an area search was more straight forward. I\'m in Brooklyn, when I do a search near me, only Manhattan results appear.
